entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
